analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Hold.refund (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol#548-566):
	External calls:
	- currentParticipantAddress = registry.getContributorByIndex(nextContributorToTransferEth) (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol#552-554)
	- EthAmount = registry.getContributionETH(currentParticipantAddress) (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol#563-566)
	External calls sending eth:
	- currentParticipantAddress.transfer(EthAmount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- hasWithdrawedEth (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol)
	- nextContributorToTransferEth (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol)
UnityToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol#395-401) is declared view but contains assembly code
tkn in ERC223ReceivingContract.tokenFallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol#268-270) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in UnityToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol#387-388) is a local variable never initialiazed

Hold.refund has external calls inside a loop:
	- currentParticipantAddress = registry.getContributorByIndex(nextContributorToTransferEth) (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol#552-554)

Hold.refund has external calls inside a loop:
	- EthAmount = registry.getContributionETH(currentParticipantAddress) (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol#563-566)

Hold.refund has external calls inside a loop:
	- currentParticipantAddress.transfer(EthAmount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol)

UnityToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/28/0xcefa3e88393cf17c9b4dc6c9fe5357dfae8036d6.sol#395-401)
